import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Viewkhohang() { const[khohang,setData] = useState({}); const {ma_kho_hang} = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/getkhohang/${ma_kho_hang}`) .then((resq)=> setData({...resq.data[0]})); },[]); return (

Thông tin kho hàng

) }
